author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

This PR tries to clean DT DQM code from DDU settings belonging to Legacy (Run1) 

#### PR validation:

Tested with runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No need to backport. Cleaning targeting Run3
title: DT DQM: attempt to clean Legacy (Run1) DDU settings
